binding:binding.name: BCO Binding
binding:binding.description: This is the binding for BCO.
binding:binding.author: Tamino Huxohl

parameter.name: rsbHost
parameter.label: RSB Host
parameter.description: The RSB host used by this binding. Per default this is localhost or the value defined in the file $Home/.config/rsb.conf

parameter.name: rsbPort
parameter.label: RSB Port
parameter.description: The RSB port used by this binding. Per default this is 4803 or the value defined in the file $Home/.config/rsb.conf
